__e: I believe that I can affect change in my relationship.
You're as much a part of what is happening here as the Sheriff and his metal knights!
Your mother told me that... you have been traumatized by the Red Knights, that you saw your friend die horribly.
I believed these attacks by the Red Knights were a personal vendetta against me, and thus, I tried to handle this threat alone, but I see now they seek to bring down the entire Valois family.
I don't know who to fear more, the Red Knights or her.
When you were here before, how long until the Ghost Riders showed up?
Then he can hear me say he needs to shut up so we can figure out how to fight the Ghost Riders.
He's the reason the Ghost Rider left the party.
Three knights of the familia, five horsemen.
It is breathtaking, a love like this.
This meeting is for knights of the night only.
The greatest riders in the world.
The Knights of the Holy Order know all about you.
Just like the knights of old.
Sir, we were told to expect 12 riders and the King.
They say his people were horsemen and that he is the last of them.
So, you can save yourself, or you can make a deal with me, and save the Four Horsemen, and stop wasting both of our time.
